tool_description: Fast Routing API including turn-by-turn directions with worldwide coverage and high availability. Online demo: https://fast-routing-api.demo.routingapi.net/
name: Fast Routing
title: Fast Routing

api_list.name: Get Route
api_list.description: Get a driving route for cars (with turn-by-turn directions) by submitting (at least) a start- and endpoint.

required_parameters.name: coordinates

optional_parameters.name: continue_straight
optional_parameters.description: Forces the route to keep going straight at waypoints constraining uturns there even if it would be faster. Default is `default`, which translates to `true`.

optional_parameters.name: waypoints
optional_parameters.description: Example: `{index};{index};{index}`. Treats input coordinates indicated by given indices as waypoints in returned Match object. Default is to treat all input coordinates as waypoints.

optional_parameters.name: alternatives
optional_parameters.description: Show alternative routes? Either `true`, `false` (default) or a number [1,..,n] (of alternative routes to show if available).

optional_parameters.name: annotations
optional_parameters.description: Either `true` , `false` (default), `nodes` , `distance` , `duration` , `datasources` , `weight` , `speed`. Defines if additional data for each coordinate should be returned.

optional_parameters.name: geometries
optional_parameters.description: Either `polyline` (default), `polyline6` or `geojson`. Returned route geometry format (influences overview and per step).

optional_parameters.name: exclude
optional_parameters.description: Example: `{class}`. Type of step to be avoided on route. Can be either `motorway`, `ferry` or `toll`.

optional_parameters.name: bearings
optional_parameters.description: Value: `{bearing};{bearing}[;{bearing} ...]`. Limits the search to segments with given bearing in degrees towards true north in clockwise direction for each waypoint defined in coordinates.

optional_parameters.name: skip_waypoints
optional_parameters.description: Default is `false`. Removes waypoints from the response. Waypoints are still calculated, but not serialized. Could be useful in case you are interested in some other part of response and do not want to transfer waste data.

optional_parameters.name: snapping
optional_parameters.description: `Default` snapping avoids is_startpoint edges, `any` will snap to any edge in the graph.

optional_parameters.name: approaches
optional_parameters.description: Value: `{approach};{approach}[;{approach} ...]`. Keep waypoints on curb side for each waypoint defined in coordinates path paramter.

optional_parameters.name: overview
optional_parameters.description: Add overview geometry either `full` or  `simplified` according to highest zoom level it could be displayed on a map, or not at all (`false`). Default is `simplified`.

optional_parameters.name: radiuses
optional_parameters.description: Values: `{radius};{radius}[;{radius} ...]`. Limits the search to given radius in meters. Set one radius for each waypoint defined in coordinates path parameter.

optional_parameters.name: steps
optional_parameters.description: Get turn-by-turn direction information. Default is `false`.
